about_the_game:
Zombie Invasion

Zombie Invasion is an intense, action-packed first-person shooter that throws you into a relentless battle for survival against waves of the undead. Set in a mysterious, crumbling temple, you'll face hordes of zombies in an ever-escalating fight to stay alive.

Features:

Endless Survival Mode: Test your endurance in a non-stop zombie onslaught, where each round becomes more challenging as the number of zombies increases.

Diverse Weapon Arsenal: Arm yourself with a variety of weapons, including an Axe, Pistol, and Shotgun. As you progress, upgrade your arsenal with enhanced versions of these weapons, each offering improved damage and increased ammo capacity.

Horde System: Every 10 rounds, brace yourself for a special horde wave, where up to 50 zombies spawn at once. Survive the horde, and the number of zombies in the next wave increases by 10%, pushing your survival skills to the limit.

In-Game Store: Earn points by defeating zombies and spend them in the store to buy ammo, health items, and limited-use skills like a nuke. Customize your loadout to fit your survival strategy.

Dynamic Spawn System: Experience a challenging progression as each round starts with a set number of zombies, increasing in difficulty with every round. Adjust your strategy as the game becomes more intense with each wave.

Achievement Tracking: Keep track of your zombie kills as you work towards unlocking Steam achievements. Can you reach the top and prove yourself as the ultimate survivor?

Immersive Atmosphere: Fight through a richly detailed temple environment, enhanced with atmospheric lighting and sound effects that pull you deeper into the world of Zombie Invasion.

Upcoming Features: Stay tuned for future updates, including new weapons, skills, and performance improvements, ensuring the action never stops.

Are you ready to face the invasion? Wishlist Zombie Invasion now and prepare for an all-out battle for survival!
